text: and this is the evidence of the violence
overnight here in cheapest town we are
in the east of Johannesburg this group
of people here have been agitating
overnight trying to go to the foreign
owned shops and as you can see down
there you see police are creating a
buffer between themselves and some of
the foreign owned shops here there's
some smaller in fire there's been debris
all over the place from the overnight
violence and that has happened even
today on Friday and then there is a big
police vehicle they are trying to
protect the foreign-owned shops because
this group of people say they do not
want foreigners here they say these
foreigners are taking their jobs and
they follow me
that's what's been happening here in the
east of Johannesburg with a xenophobia
violence
